page.title: 07Industy (Andrew Antenna)
page.content:
In the N.W. quadrant of the grid the modern factory of "Andrew Antenna" lies adjacent to Lochgelly Loch, about one mile outside the town of Lochgelly. The firm constructs antenna for tele-communications. The antenna weigh about 9 tons and are made from aluminium base. They are used to receive message and pictures from statelite travelling out in space. Andrew's sells 95% of their output to British Telecom and the armed forces. The type of antenna they use is called a 'Terrestrial'.
